content: Celtics and Spurs are too high. Both rely on depth and play at high levels all season, and we’ve seen these teams come up short in the postseason when benches shorten, effort increases, and superstars reign. They’re very good teams, but they don’t SCARE you. Playoff Russ or Freak or a million Rockets threes, now that’s terrifying. Sheer unpredictability.
